price: اېمان نه دی راوړی د دوی نه مخکې کلیو والا کوم چې موږ هلاک کړي، نو آیا دوی به اېمان راوړي؟
arabic: مَآ ءَامَنَتۡ قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآۖ أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: mā āmanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknāhā afahum yu'minūna
